content.text:
# Special Awards at MTV Europe Music Awards

The following is a list of the MTV Europe Music Award winners of special awards.
Artist's Choice Award
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Winner
|-
| 2007 || Amy Winehouse
|-
| 2008 || Lil Wayne
|}
MTV Voice Award
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Winner
|-
| 2011 || Justin Bieber
|}
Power of Music Award
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Winner
|-
| 2017 || Artists for Grenfell
|}
Ultimate Legend Award
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Winner
|-
| 2008 || Paul McCartney
|}
Video Visionary Award
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Winner
|-
| 2015 || Duran Duran
|}
Best Act Ever
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Winner !! Nominee
|-
| 2008 || Rick Astley ||
* Britney Spears
* Christina Aguilera
* Green Day
* Tokio Hotel
* U2
|}
Best Song with a Social Message
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Winner !! Nominee
|-
| 2014 || Beyoncé - "Pretty Hurts" ||
* Alicia Keys - "We Are Here"
* Arcade Fire - "We Exist"
* Hozier - "Take Me to Church"
* Meghan Trainor - "All About That Bass"
|}
Generation Change Award
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Winners
|-
| 2018 ||
* Sonita Alizadeh
* Hauwa Ojeifo
* Xiuhtezcatl "X" Martinez
* Mohamad Al Jounde
* Ellen Jones
|-
| 2019 ||
* Alfredo "Danger" Martinez
* Shiden Tekle
* Lisa Ranran Hu
* Kelvin Doe
* Jamie Margolin
|-
| 2020 ||
* Luiza Brasil
* Kiki Mordi
* Temi Mwale
* Catherhea Potjanaporn
* Raquel Willis
|-
| 2021 ||
* Amir Ashour
* Matthew Blaise
* Sage Dolan-Sandrino
* Erika Hilton
* Viktória Radványi
|}
